attributes.additional_details: Britain is a nation that was and should always be diverse & be in a position where it set world standards and showing such a disregard for a huge proportion of British people that now due to this bill will fear that they can and will be abandoned at any moment & without notice. Regardless of heritage or ethnicity for all there is no second class Briton.
attributes.background: I wish to government to revoke its decision to introduce this bill, that will give the government draconian powers to remove people's citizenship or create a 2nd tier British citizen. This country was built off of inclusive the idea that together we are stronger, this is not the message given.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Remove Clause 9 from the Nationality and Borders Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601583
